# **ASSESSMENT OF LEARNING OUTCOMES**

A pre-test and post-test shall be administered before and after the training via online platform. All participants will be provided with a printed worksheet that will include formative assessment activities for the learning outcomes of the workshop. The accomplished worksheets shall be presented to the workshop secretariat prior to the issuance of their certificate of participation.
